row.text: P(ontium), archiepiscopum Narbonensem, (Adelbertum) Nemausensem, (Raimundum) Uceticensem, (Aldebertum) Mimatensem, Glohannem) Magalonensem episcopos, „super pedagiorum enormitate tollenda studiosos“ laudat. Addit de rata habenda sententia, prolata in Bernardum comitem Melgoriensem, cui litteras se direxisse dicit „sine ulla tamen salutatione“. Gariel Ser. I. 213, Bouquet Rec. XV. 813, Migne 200 p. 327.
